mapper.insert: insert into tbl_group(gno, g_name, excercise_type, g_attend, g_intro, g_location, g_pic, users) values(seq_group_gno.nextval, #{g_name}, #{excercise_type}, #{g_attend},#{g_intro}, #{g_location}, #{g_pic, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{users})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_group order by gno desc
mapper.update: update tbl_user set gno = #{gno} where userid = #{userid}
update tbl_group set g_present = #{g_present} + 1, users = concat(#{users}, userid) where gno = #{gno}
